    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkoutMaterials()
      Requests for the call number from the user, uses the findItem() method to check if that item exists in the library, and if it does calls the checkOut() method for that item and prints out the item that has been checked out.
      void displayCollection()
      Displays the collection of library items to the screen
      ILibrary findItem(java.lang.String callNum)
      Searches in both the array of books and the array of periodicals for the book with the call number received as a parameter.
      void readInput(java.lang.String fileName)
      Reads data from the input file and stores the items in the appropriate array.
      void showMenu()
      Displays the menu options to the user.

      • checkoutMaterials

        public void checkoutMaterials()
        Requests for the call number from the user, uses the findItem() method to check if that item exists in the library, and if it does calls the checkOut() method for that item and prints out the item that has been checked out.

      • findItem

        public ILibrary findItem(java.lang.String callNum)
        Searches in both the array of books and the array of periodicals for the book with the call number received as a parameter.
        Specified by:
        findItem in interface IController
        Parameters:
        callNum - The call number of the item requested by the user
        Returns:
        The requested item, or 'null' if item does not exist.
